preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 10 g of cesium (Cs) and place it in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 2. Add 5 g of neodymium (Nd) to the container. 
 3. Introduce 40 g of selenium (Se) into the mixture. 
 4. Add 20 g of silicon (Si) and 5 g of samarium (Sm). 
 5. Use a spatula to mix the ingredients thoroughly until a uniform blend is achieved.
